$$
y = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x + u
$$

$$
\hat{\beta}_1 = \frac{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})^2}, 
\quad 
\hat{\beta}_0 = \bar{y} - \hat{\beta}_1 \bar{x}
$$

$$
SST = SSE + SSR, 
\quad R^2 = 1 - \frac{SSR}{SST}
$$

---

$$
y = X\beta + u, 
\quad 
\hat{\beta} = (X'X)^{-1} X'y
$$

$$
Var(\hat{\beta}|X) = \sigma^2 (X'X)^{-1}, 
\quad \hat{\sigma}^2 = \frac{SSR}{n-k-1}
$$

---

$$
t = \frac{\hat{\beta}_j - \beta_{j,0}}{se(\hat{\beta}_j)}
$$

$$
\hat{\beta}_1^{IV} = \frac{\sum z_i y_i}{\sum z_i x_i}
$$

$$
\hat{\beta}^{2SLS} = (X'P_Z X)^{-1} X'P_Z y, 
\quad P_Z = Z(Z'Z)^{-1}Z'
